segments.text: Have you heard about Michael's new home ? It's in one of the poshest areas in this area .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is he living in the new housing estate in Killington ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , he's living in an old house in Warton .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean the one near the health centre on Old Slate Road ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: His house must be worth millions ! That is one of the most beautiful areas in Oxford . The surrounding area is really peaceful , and getting into the city centre from there is very convenient . How can he afford that place ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He didn't buy it . His grandfather died recently and left him loads of money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did he know that his grandfather was so wealthy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No one in the family expected to get a dime from him . It was quite a surprise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He still has a complaint though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He wanted to live right on a bus line , but he doesn't . so , if he wants to take a bus anywhere , he has to walk 1/4 mile to get to a bus stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The poor thing . It must be difficult being him .
segments.speaker: S2
